Name: Bradley Locker
Content:
Northwestern football has lost five straight games broadcast on ABC/an ESPN network.

The last Wildcat win on such a channel? The 2021 Citrus Bowl.

Big opportunity for things to come full circle in front of a national audience in a primetime slot today.

Name: NUMBSpiritLeader
Content: After a review, it is PU 3rd&inches at the #Northwestern 13.5...need a stop here...STOPPED! 4th down and 2 to go...PU going for it...STONED!!!! #WILDCAT FOOTBALL!

Name: Tim lawrence
Content: Oh , the irony of how two schools treat their Head Football Coach. One defends him to the end although guilty, and one fires him after a six month investigation finding him innocent. And no one on the inside dares to take a stand. I’m ashamed to be a Northwestern Wildcat.

Name: Chicago Sun-Times
Content: Former Northwestern football captains shared experiences of racism and being forced to conform to the "Wildcat Way," which they say was “coded white culture.”

Name: Sun-Times Sports
Content: Two former Northwestern football captains talked about their experiences of racial discrimination within the program and being forced as young Black men to conform to the “Wildcat Way,” which they say was “coded white culture.”

Content: Thursday on the 'Doug and Daddy Show' a preview of Northwestern with Louie Vaccher of Wildcat Report  Tri-City Storm head coach Anthony Noreen  and Joe Bartel  of Rotowire answers your fantasy football questions. Join us at 11!

Content: I will be on the broadcast of the Upper St. Clair Panthers football game against Fox Chapel this evening at 7:00.   Joining me will be Class of 2012 USCHS graduate and former Panther and Northwestern Wildcat standout, Jack Schwaba.  Go Panthers!

Content: Today Ryan Hilinski will be running out as the quarterback for the wildcats. Against all the controversy in the program he will exceed and show the world what Northwestern Wildcat football is all about. I’m not sure who Jacob Milroe or Tyrone Simpson is Doctor?

Name: Take It To-Go Podcast
Content: Hey Tom! We're two former NUFB student staffers who recorded a podcast about our time inside Northwestern's football program. We have an opinion on this very topic. Hope it's informative for you and other Wildcat fans!

Content: We're two former NUFB student staffers who recorded a podcast about our time inside the Northwestern football program. We speak candidly about everything from the hazing allegations to the tee shirts. Hope it's informative for you and other Wildcat fans!

Name: Take It To-Go Podcast
Content: Hey Austin, we're two former NUFB student staffers who recorded a podcast about our time inside the Northwestern football program. We speak rather candidly. Hope it's informative for you and other Wildcat fans!

Name: Frank Grizzly
Content:
Justin Jackson is a product of Glenbard North, and a Northwestern Wildcat alum.

Should be great to see where the former first-team All-Big Ten RB takes his talents next, away from the game of football.

Name: secular
Content: But what about Northwestern Wildcat football this season?

Name: College Football On ClutchPoints
Content: Former Wildcat AD reacts to being tied into hazing allegations within the Northwestern football program.

Name: Dennis
Content: That’s the big announcement?  I was hoping the Score was the new home of Northwestern Wildcat Football….Go Cats.

Name: Outside the Lines
Content:
Two former Northwestern athletes are suing the university, saying its leadership was negligent in allowing hazing within the Wildcat football program.

Patrick Salvi — an attorney in the players' civil lawsuit — explains the grounds for a potential criminal investigation.

Name: Donald R. Koelper
Content: Northwestern head football coach Pat Fitzgerald, who's run the Wildcat program for 17 seasons, was fired last night by university President Michael Schill after credible allegations of team hazing were raised two weeks ago by the school's newspaper.

Name: CHGO Bears
Content:
Coming up at 12pm central:

We'll talk with former Northwestern Wildcat, Corey Wootton, about the fallout from the football program and the firing of Pat Fitzgerald.

Name: Bruce Feldman
Content: With Pat Fitzgerald fired, Northwestern will hire a new football coach later this year. There's a dream candidate out there with deep Wildcat ties but we doubt that one's gonna happen. Here's how we expect Northwestern's coaching search to shape up.

Name: Paul
Content: I believe the no one in the country is better equipped to lead the Northwestern Wildcat football program than Brian Ferentz.

Name: OutKick
Content: Pat Fitzgerald is in HOT water at Northwestern. Discussing the latest hazing allegations surrounding Wildcat football NOW

Name: Tom Mars
Content: Former Northwestern football player alleges that head coach Pat Fitzgerald would ask Black players and coaches to cut off longer hairstyles — including dreadlocks — so that they were more in line with what Fitzgerald called the “Wildcat Way.” Apparently, Fitz didn’t get the memo.

Name: Tom Hunter
Content: So, this “culture” existed within the Wildcat football program for the entirety of ACC Commissioner Jim Phillips’ tenure as Northwestern AD. The entirety of the tenure he was Fitzgerald’s boss. 2008-2021. What did Jim Phillips know?

Name: 3x Cup Champs
Content: Money, power, and relationships it seems. Can’t imagine Northwestern football is making bank for the university, esp the last two seasons. But he’s a lifelong wildcat, so I guess that counts for something.

Name: Chicago Tribune Sports
Content: Northwestern suspended football coach Pat Fitzgerald two weeks without pay after an investigation confirmed hazing incidents by Wildcat players.

Name: Baltimore Sun Sports
Content: Northwestern suspended football coach Pat Fitzgerald two weeks without pay Friday after an investigation confirmed hazing incidents by Wildcat players.

Name: ESPN Tri-Cities
Content: Friday on the 'Doug and Daddy Show' our Big Ten football preview with Louie Vaccher  of Wildcat Report to chat Northwestern. Hastings High grad Kaelan Schultz, Nebraska' all-time HR leader, is transferring to Creighton  and she'll tell us why.
